name: Novotel Kota Kinabalu 1Borneo

reviews.text: The pluses of Novotel1Borneo are (i) reasonable room rates for quite spacious rooms (ii) a basic bar on the second floor (iii) the conveniences from being next to a Mall of 1 mil sq ft
reviews.title: Meet your need if expectations are not high

reviews.text: While I had a pleasant enough stay, some of my friends travelling with me had a couple of hiccups. One had a room that had a constant humming sound from the air conditioner fan coil but was unable to change his room. Another had a missing wakeup call resulting in a mad rush in our itinerary.
reviews.title: A decent stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service level was inefficient. We booked for 4 rooms but when checking-in , their system showed only 3 rooms resulting in an exceptionally long delay in check-in. One do not expect such basic level booking service to screw up.
reviews.title: Good value for the money

reviews.text: We had a wonderful holidaya at Novotel@1Borneo Mall, KK. Everyone at the hotel is most helpful and all our requests are met with a smile. The rooms are spacious and the view is good. Overall, the 18 of us are most satisfied with our stay there. This is my second stay at the same hotel and the standards are always excellent. We feel most welcomed.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay at Novotel!

reviews.text: I stayed at Novotel, KK for 3 nights (a family of four, our two boys are 5 and 8). I think it is more a business hotel. No fuss, checked-in (with barely a smile from the counter staff). There's a pool and a family room. Free Wifi at the lobby.
reviews.title: No frills. No late check out?
Enchanting
reviews.text: The good thing? The location. Near to the big mall which means you have constant access to food!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bad thing? We had asked for a late check-out till 3 PM as our flight was at 6 PM. They had told us that they cannot give us the late check-out as the hotels are booked out (ok, which is reasonable...) but for a fee of half-day stay, we can stay till late. Eh? Oh well.
reviews.title: Good service and Modern style

reviews.text: I stayed few days in that hotel for business with some fellow-workers. This hotel is amazing. Rooms are really spacious, modern and destressing, which is essential after a work day. The business center is really professional. The staff is well trained. If you're looking for a place to feel like home, go to Novotel 1Borneo.
reviews.title: A memorable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you don't mind the location, it is really a good hotel to stay. It is located in a shopping mall. No doubt, there is limited good eateries in the mall. I really like the design of the room, the bathroom, and it is clean and it is of a good size. In terms of price, it is not too bad. Of course, you can't compare this to another Novotel in Bangkok (bear in mind that Thailand has put in lots of efforts to promote tourism and thus their hotel quality are of a higher standard). Overall, I have no complaint on this hotel and would love to stay here again during my next trip if I do rent a car. They provide free internet connection in the room. However, the internet connect service at the lobby is really slow.
reviews.title: Room is of good size, modern design and clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My BF and stayed at the Novotel in KK for 3 days in August 09.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel but too far from City Area

reviews.text: This hotel is very chic.It reminds me of the small hotels in NYC- very trendy. It's located literally attached to 1Borneo the largest mall on the island of Borneo. Nothing's very far in Borneo, so while this is a bit "on the other side of town" it's perfect if you're there for shopping and nightlife.
reviews.title: Great if you're in KK for shopping

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel's rooms are nice and priced right for the expensive city of Kota Kinabalu, however, the hotel staff are somewhat useless (although very polite and always smile) It seems like every question is extremely difficult to answer.
reviews.title: Did not think it would be wierd staying in a mall....but it was.

reviews.text: 1Borneo is quite far from the city center so you have to plan your days around their shuttle bus or pay the expensive taxi to the mall.
reviews.title: Wonderful place

reviews.text: I would not stay there again.
reviews.title: Great place to end my memorable family trip..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have spent three nightrs at the Novotel with my partner. Tip when reading the reviews be wary of the 1 contribution tripadvisor reports for this hotel!
reviews.title: Nice Hotel - Ordinary Location

reviews.text: There is much to like about this hotel but also many minor annoyances.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text: I'll start with the positive. The room rate is very good value, especially if you get a deal with free wifi in your room and breakfast. Breakfast is the standard 4 sar hotel fare. It does though most of the cooked food tends to be more in line with asian tastes - not even beef bacon. The freshly cooked eggs are very good! The rooms though on the small side are very clean, well maintained, good flat screen tv but only 5 channels for english speakers, 2 sport, disney, bbc and movie station. The pillows are excellent bu those who prefer a softer bed will find the beds very unforgiving - my wife prefers a hard mattress and found it a non issue - opoosite for me. The hotel pool is an aceptable area - it is though not an inviting area, few plants, starting to show it has not been maintained in a while and very few lounge decks. If you are lucky enough to get one they are very comfy. We found all but 1 of the staff to be very friendly and helpful - especially the waiters in the restaurant. The lifts are quick and efficient. The hotel is attched to a very large shopping Mall. The mall has a lot of shops but not many shoppers! It has a few good things for children, bowling, internet games and a very good picture theatre with latest release movies - very cheap! There are no quality restaurants, the KK food blog are correct when they say that most of the restaurants are 2 to 3 stars out of 5! There are the usual food chain restaurants from KFC, Pizza Hut to malaysian chians such as secret reicpe. The La Feunte near the entrance to Novotel is ok and the Fish Market near the Grand Borneo ahs very good fish and chips for $6.
reviews.title: I love this hotel and all staff,the hotel is so clean and fresh,great staff friendly in service,very helpful.Clean room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not so good. It is long way from KK and anything else. If travelling in Sabah and this your base I would recommend hiringa car. Malaysian tour prices are expensive - almost wetsern prices. i.e a tour to the Monosipiad Cultural Centre is 175 rm a person. 65 entrance and 110 RM to get their which is a 30 minute bus ride!! Tip negotiate a a fare with taxi driver and check the times for the shows ( i only rate the centre a 2.5 out of 5 at best though!)
reviews.title: Great Experiences, Great Services & Warm Welcome

reviews.text: The special new year seve buffet was a joke. Advertised turkey, tenderloin and seafood on ice at 88RM but none of these items were available. Tip look at what is on offer before agreeing to the meal. The new Years day Buffet at 32 RM though was good value!
reviews.title: everything okey

reviews.text: All A to Z was mazing, thanks to all the Staff for your good service and follow up.
reviews.title: The Best Hotel to stay in KK

reviews.text: We are coming back.
reviews.title: Excellent family hotel ever.....

reviews.text: The Food and Room's was really good keep going .
reviews.title: Hotel service could be better.......
A good deal and nice stay
reviews.text: Nice hotel, good service, good value for money but a bit far from city centre.

reviews.title: when will muslims rule all the world
reviews.text: this was another ACCOR treat. The hotel was superb, with it being located in a large mall, also was very convienient.
the staff as you konw, in all asian destinations reflect the people, so they were very helpful and freindly.
reviews.title: nice room with good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very disappointing experience. Rooms very small and the bathrooms poorly designed and dangerous. Walls and floors all wonky! Swimming pool closed with no warning. Breakfast bad quality food and inconsistent. Not usual Novotel standard at all
reviews.title: Don't bother!

aka: Novotel Kota Kinabalu 1borneo Hotel Kota Kinabalu
description: Novotel Kota Kinabalu 1Borneo, a 4 star International Chain hotel where travelers feel at home is an integral part of 1Borneo Hypermall, the largest mall in Borneo with 1.5 million square feet of shopping, leisure and dining choices.It is strategically located along the Sulaman Highway and is within 10 minutes from Kota Kinabalu City Centre. The hotel is also adjacent to University Malaysia Sabah and with proximity to the State & Federal Administration Government offices and Kota Kinabalu Industrial Park (KKIP).It is within 25 minutes from the Kota Kinabalu International Airport. All of our 263 rooms and suites are uniquely designed with comfort in mind. Spacious rooms with contemporary decor to guarantee you have the best comfort in your room.
